To make the gnocchi, it's actually quite simple.
After the potatoes are roasted, mash them up really well, either through a potato ricer or even with a fork.
Add the orange zest.

You roll it out into long cords.
You cut them into very small pieces, about three-quarters of an inch wide.

Scatter your roasted nuts on top - and that's it.
